22 template <typename T>
23 T read_bits(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits);
24 
25 template <>
26 inline int8_t read_bits<int8_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
27 {
28  return static_cast<int8_t>(in.readSignedBits(numBits));
29 }
30 
31 template <>
32 inline int16_t read_bits<int16_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
33 {
34  return static_cast<int16_t>(in.readSignedBits(numBits));
35 }
36 
37 template <>
38 inline int32_t read_bits<int32_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
39 {
40  return in.readSignedBits(numBits);
41 }
42 
43 template <>
44 inline int64_t read_bits<int64_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
45 {
46  return in.readSignedBits64(numBits);
47 }
48 
49 template <>
50 inline uint8_t read_bits<uint8_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
51 {
52  return static_cast<uint8_t>(in.readBits(numBits));
53 }
54 
55 template <>
56 inline uint16_t read_bits<uint16_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
57 {
58  return static_cast<uint16_t>(in.readBits(numBits));
59 }
60

62 inline uint32_t read_bits<uint32_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
63 {
64  return in.readBits(numBits);
65 }

67 template <>
68 inline uint64_t read_bits<uint64_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
69 {
70  return in.readBits64(numBits);
71 }

73 template <typename T>
74 void write_bits(BitStreamWriter& out, T value, uint8_t numBits);
75 
76 template <>
77 inline void write_bits<int8_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, int8_t value, uint8_t numBits)
78 {
79  out.writeSignedBits(static_cast<int32_t>(value), numBits);
80 }
81 
82 template <>
83 inline void write_bits<int16_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, int16_t value, uint8_t numBits)
84 {
85  out.writeSignedBits(static_cast<int32_t>(value), numBits);
86 }
87 
88 template <>
89 inline void write_bits<int32_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, int32_t value, uint8_t numBits)
90 {
91  out.writeSignedBits(value, numBits);
92 }
93 
94 template <>
95 inline void write_bits<int64_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, int64_t value, uint8_t numBits)
96 {
97  out.writeSignedBits64(value, numBits);
98 }
99 
100 template <>
101 inline void write_bits<uint8_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, uint8_t value, uint8_t numBits)
102 {
103  out.writeBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(value), numBits);
104 }
105 
106 template <>
107 inline void write_bits<uint16_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, uint16_t value, uint8_t numBits)
108 {
109  out.writeBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(value), numBits);
110 }
111 
112 template <>
113 inline void write_bits<uint32_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, uint32_t value, uint8_t numBits)
114 {

116 }

118 template <>
119 inline void write_bits<uint64_t>(BitStreamWriter& out, uint64_t value, uint8_t numBits)
120 {
121  out.writeBits64(value, numBits);

125 
129 template <typename T>
130 class BitFieldArrayTraits
131 {
132 public:
134  using ElementType = T;
135 
141  explicit BitFieldArrayTraits(uint8_t numBits) :
142  m_numBits(numBits)
143  {}
144 
150  size_t bitSizeOf() const
151  {
152  return m_numBits;
153  }
154 
160  size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, ElementType) const
161  {
162  return m_numBits;
163  }
164 
172  size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, ElementType) const
173  {
174  return bitPosition + m_numBits;
175  }
176 
184  ElementType read(BitStreamReader& in) const
185  {
186  return detail::read_bits<T>(in, m_numBits);
187  }
188 
195  void write(BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element) const
196  {
197  detail::write_bits(out, element, m_numBits);
198  }
199 
201  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
202 
203 private:
204  uint8_t m_numBits;
205 };
206 
210 template <typename T>
211 struct StdIntArrayTraits
212 {
214  using ElementType = T;
215 
221  static size_t bitSizeOf()
222  {
223  return NUM_BITS;
224  }
225 
231  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, ElementType)
232  {
233  return bitSizeOf();
234  }
235 
243  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, ElementType)
244  {
245  return bitPosition + NUM_BITS;
246  }
247 
255  static ElementType read(BitStreamReader& in)
256  {
257  return detail::read_bits<T>(in, NUM_BITS);
258  }
259 
266  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element)
267  {
268  detail::write_bits(out, element, NUM_BITS);
269  }
270 
272  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
273 
274 private:
275  static const uint8_t NUM_BITS = sizeof(T) * 8;
276 };

1113 template <template <typename> class ALLOC = std::allocator>
1114 struct BasicStringArrayTraits
1115 {
1117  using ElementType = ::zserio::string<ALLOC<char>>;
1118 
1120  using allocator_type = typename ElementType::allocator_type;
1121 
1129  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, const ElementType& element)
1130  {
1131  return zserio::bitSizeOfString(element);
1132  }
1133 
1142  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, const ElementType& element)
1143  {
1144  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, element);
1145  }
1146 
1154  static ElementType read(BitStreamReader& in, const allocator_type& allocator)
1155  {
1156  return in.readString(allocator);
1157  }
1158 
1165  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, const ElementType& element)
1166  {
1167  out.writeString(element);
1168  }
1169 
1171  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1172 };

1180 struct BasicBitBufferArrayTraits

1243 template <typename T>
1244 struct EnumArrayTraits
1245 {
1247  using ElementType = T;
1248 
1256  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, ElementType element)
1257  {
1258  return zserio::bitSizeOf(element);
1259  }
1260 
1269  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, ElementType element)
1270  {
1271  return zserio::initializeOffsets(bitPosition, element);
1272  }
1273 
1281  static ElementType read(BitStreamReader& in)
1282  {
1283  return zserio::read<ElementType>(in);
1284  }
1285 
1292  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element)
1293  {
1294  zserio::write(out, element);
1295  }
1296 
1297  // Be aware that T can be varuint, so bitSizeOf cannot return constant value.
1299  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1300 };
1301 
1305 template <typename T>
1306 struct BitmaskArrayTraits
1307 {
1309  using ElementType = T;
1310 
1318  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, ElementType element)
1319  {
1320  return element.bitSizeOf();
1321  }
1322 
1331  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, ElementType element)
1332  {
1333  return element.initializeOffsets(bitPosition);
1334  }
1335 
1343  static ElementType read(BitStreamReader& in)
1344  {
1345  return ElementType(in);
1346  }
1347 
1354  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element)
1355  {
1356  element.write(out, NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
1357  }
1358 
1359  // Be aware that T can be varuint, so bitSizeOf cannot return constant value.
1361  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1362 };
1363 
1367 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY>
1368 class ObjectArrayTraits
1369 {
1370 public:
1372  using ElementType = T;
1373 
1382  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t bitPosition, const ElementType& element)
1383  {
1384  return element.bitSizeOf(bitPosition);
1385  }
1386 
1395  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, ElementType& element)
1396  {
1397  return element.initializeOffsets(bitPosition);
1398  }
1399 
1408  template <typename RAW_ARRAY>
1409  static void read(const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory, RAW_ARRAY& rawArray,
1410  BitStreamReader& in, size_t index)
1411  {
1412  elementFactory.create(rawArray, in, index);
1413  }
1414 
1421  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType& element)
1422  {
1423  element.write(out, NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
1424  }
1425 
1427  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1428 };
1429 
1435 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
1436 class PackedArrayTraits
1437 {
1438 public:
1440  using ElementType = typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType;
1441 
1447  explicit PackedArrayTraits(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits)
1448  : m_arrayTraits(arrayTraits)
1449  {}
1450 
1456  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1457  void createContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode) const
1458  {
1459  contextNode.createContext();
1460  }
1461 
1468  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1469  void initContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, ElementType element) const
1470  {
1471  contextNode.getContext().init(element);
1472  }
1473 
1483  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1484  size_t bitSizeOf(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition, ElementType element) const
1485  {
1486  return contextNode.getContext().bitSizeOf(m_arrayTraits, bitPosition, element);
1487  }
1488 
1498  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1499  size_t initializeOffsets(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition, ElementType element) const
1500  {
1501  return bitPosition + contextNode.getContext().bitSizeOf(m_arrayTraits, bitPosition, element);
1502  }
1503 
1512  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1513  ElementType read(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamReader& in) const
1514  {
1515  return contextNode.getContext().read(m_arrayTraits, in);
1516  }
1517 
1525  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1526  void write(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element) const
1527  {
1528  contextNode.getContext().write(m_arrayTraits, out, element);
1529  }
1530 
1531 private:
1532  ARRAY_TRAITS m_arrayTraits;
1533 };
1534 
1538 template <typename T>
1539 class PackedArrayTraits<EnumArrayTraits<T>>
1540 {
1541 public:
1543  using ElementType = T;
1544 
1551  explicit PackedArrayTraits(const EnumArrayTraits<T>&)
1552  {}
1553 
1559  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1560  void createContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode) const
1561  {
1562  contextNode.createContext();
1563  }
1564 
1571  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1572  void initContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, ElementType element) const
1573  {
1574  contextNode.getContext().init(enumToValue(element));
1575  }
1576 
1586  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1587  size_t bitSizeOf(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition, ElementType element) const
1588  {
1589  return zserio::bitSizeOf(contextNode, bitPosition, element);
1590  }
1591 
1601  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1602  size_t initializeOffsets(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition, ElementType element) const
1603  {
1604  return zserio::initializeOffsets(contextNode, bitPosition, element);
1605  }
1606 
1615  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1616  ElementType read(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamReader& in) const
1617  {
1618  return zserio::read<ElementType>(contextNode, in);
1619  }
1620 
1628  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1629  void write(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType element) const
1630  {
1631  zserio::write(contextNode, out, element);
1632  }
1633 };
1634 
1635 namespace detail
1636 {
1637 
1639 template <typename T>
1640 class ObjectPackedArrayTraits
1641 {
1642 public:
1643  using ElementType = T;
1644 
1650  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1651  static void createContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode)
1652  {
1653  ElementType::createPackingContext(contextNode);
1654  }
1655 
1661  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1662  static void initContext(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, const ElementType& element)
1663  {
1664  element.initPackingContext(contextNode);
1665  }
1666 
1676  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1677  static size_t bitSizeOf(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition,
1678  const ElementType& element)
1679  {
1680  return element.bitSizeOf(contextNode, bitPosition);
1681  }
1682 
1692  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1693  static size_t initializeOffsets(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, size_t bitPosition,
1694  ElementType& element)
1695  {
1696  return element.initializeOffsets(contextNode, bitPosition);
1697  }
1698 
1706  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1707  static void write(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamWriter& out, ElementType& element)
1708  {
1709  element.write(contextNode, out);
1710  }
1711 };
1712 
1713 } // namespace detail
1714 
1718 template <typename T>
1719 class PackedArrayTraits<BitmaskArrayTraits<T>> : public detail::ObjectPackedArrayTraits<T>
1720 {
1721 public:
1723  using ElementType = T;
1724 
1731  explicit PackedArrayTraits(const BitmaskArrayTraits<T>&)
1732  {}
1733 
1742  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE>
1743  ElementType read(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamReader& in) const
1744  {
1745  return ElementType(contextNode, in);
1746  }
1747 };
1748 
1752 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY>
1753 class PackedArrayTraits<ObjectArrayTraits<T, ELEMENT_FACTORY>> : public detail::ObjectPackedArrayTraits<T>
1754 {
1755 public:
1757  using ElementType = T;
1758 
1765  explicit PackedArrayTraits(const ObjectArrayTraits<T, ELEMENT_FACTORY>&)
1766  {}
1767 
1777  template <typename PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE, typename ALLOC>
1778  static void read(PACKING_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory,
1779  std::vector<ElementType, ALLOC>& rawArray, BitStreamReader& in, size_t index)
1780  {
1781  elementFactory.create(contextNode, rawArray, in, index);
1782  }
1783 };
1784 
1785 } // namespace zserio
